snippet.title: Vampire: The Masquerade: Bloodhunt Early Access Trailer - Future Games Show Gamescom 2021
snippet.description: Vampire battle royale! Now that we've got your attention, please check out this exciting trailer for Vampire The Masquerade Bloodhunt, which is entering an early access playtest on Steam this September 7.
